body.name: Mavivegue Bookshelf, 18 Cube Storage Organizer, Extra Large Book Shelf Organizer, Tall Bookcase, Book Cases/Shelves, Black Cube Shelf, Cubbies Closet Shelves for Bedroom, Living Room, Home, Office
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 2 hrs 26 mins
features: 【Large Storage Space】: Each cube size is 15.74" x 11.8" x 11.8" (40 x 30 x 30cm), which is larger than other common sizes(11.8" x 11.8" x 11.8") so you can accommodate more items to improve the tidiness and comfort of your home
【More Choices】: We have various styles of cube shelves, such as 4/5/6/9/10/12/15/16/18/20grid black or gray or white cube shelves for you to choose,and fit different styles and sizes

【DIY As You Want】: Use your imagination, this cube structure can be composed into various shapes, such as bookshelves, storage racks, wardrobe organizers, each shape can make your layout more flexible and diverse

【Store As You Like】: Our storage shelves can accommodate different kinds of items as you like, such as books、clothes、 toys、 picture frames and more.There is a hook on the side of the bookshelf, which can store hats or umbrellas.But we don't recommend that you place items over 30 lbs.

【Easy To Assemble】: These modules are in a cubic structure, which is more convenient for you to assemble. At the same time, we have a matching installation guide, so you don't have to worry about being confused after receiving it.
【Suitable For Different Scenarios】:The application scene of this bookshelf is not fixed, you can decide according to your personal preference,such as study room, living room, bedroom, office and more

【Several High-quality Materials】：Our products are made of various materials, including metal tubes, ABS plastic compounds, and non-woven fabrics. The combination of these materials is water resistance and easier to clean, while helping you maintain an overall aesthetic. The joint is made of high-quality plastic, which has high stability and is more environmentally friendly.
【Thoughtful After-sales Service】: If you have any issue, please contact us after you receive our product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it hate my inability to read directions lol
reviews.reviewText: Very well built not sure if it was my own stupidity or the instructions as I can't find the instructions to verify but I think I put the sleeves on wrong lol. Otherwise as long as your careful it is kinda brittle depending on how much force you put on the metal beams. Otherwise I love it. It's absolutely perfect for holding onto my collectibles :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars exactly as advertised -- great value
reviews.reviewText: I opened the box and found what seemed like a gazillion pieces . . .but it was very easy to assemble and i had it done, by myself, in probably 30 minutes. The pieces fit well together, it is VERY lightweight, so moving it into place was a cinch (I( am 78 year old female) I didn't use the wall attachments to avoid holes in the apartment i rent, so i used 3M xl velcro strips and they work like a charm. I am very pleased with this unit. I am using it as a pantry, so some things are heavy, but the unit is solid and shows no sign of failing. Well worth the money!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars So far so good
reviews.reviewText: I have seen reviews where people’s stuff had fallen and hopefully mine will stay.More than twice my kitten had perched on top and knocked down several boxes but seems to have not tumbled yet like the reviews does.It took me frustratingly solid 2 hours to figure it out and even then I knew that I put it wrong but that is all I can do than having to remove it and put it back again.Some parts will move and dislodged quickly because of course of the force of the other side would have made a shift, causing the other parts to move.This is why it’s kinda wise to check on it and don’t put a lot of weight on this like books because it maybe not the best use for this. I only use this shelf for my Knick knacks to organize my little dorm.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price
reviews.reviewText: Got it today, Honestly pretty good for the price, was easy to put together, didn't need the mallet to get the poles in all the way, Pretty sturdy but definitely recommend attaching it to the wall, they provide the wall secure parts. Fit perfect in my closet that has no shelves and room to use the hangers on the side. Would def recommend if you need something cheap and need storage for decently light weight items. Once you get one row made it's just copy and place.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: For the price and what I needed this for...I am VERY impressed. No, it is not the sturdiest cubicle storage on the market, but it is sturdy.I do have a small business and just needed a basic storage system to assist with it. This is going to be PERFECT for that, and for what it's worth it is pretty attractive. Should I need more storage, I would definitely buy this again!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality for the price
reviews.reviewText: Very sturdy and so easy to assemble. I have approximately 80 articles of clothing folded and stored in this in any given day. No issues at all. Great price point and clear instructions. All folded clothes fit in the cubbies perfectly and easy to get to. Will purchase again if need another one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not what I expected
reviews.reviewText: Im giving a 3 star because of my own lack of research about the product before purchasing. Otherwise itd be 2 star or even 1. It is easy to assemble, HOWEVER, it is a nightmare to keep together once you do have it assembled. Its plastic and very very cheap thin metal rods that give this structure. Although I shouldn't expect a crazy good product out of 40$, Im not sure I trust this thing at all stability wise. If you pull on it too much one way, or maybe even trying to get something big out that may be pushing the walls apart, it can very easily come apart and then its a pain to put back together. You almost have to mount it to the wall if you plan on having anything remotely heavy in it like books or a TV. And even then it comes apart again. Its a great idea but a very poor execution. I think a little more consideration into material and rigidity of the structure may up the price, but Id rather spend a little more than get something Im already considering replacing after just 2 days.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It was not as sturdy as I expected but once it is together it’s pretty good. Took a while to put together. It works great as a stand for toy bins.
not firm enough to hold hard cover books, some rods may dislocate too.
